messages.message: Do we support terraform module repo in crafting sandbox?
tfenv (https://github.com/tfutils/tfenv) is installed by default if that's what you mean?
Umm I mean whether I can develop code of terraform-modules repo? I don't find ~/terraform-modules, so may be not supported?

oh yeah, just do a `git clone git@github.com:instabase/terraform-modules.git` from your home directory :slightly_smiling_face: your crafting sandbox is just a linux VM, there isn't any hard requirement on which repos you have checked out
